tool_description: A API to easily save audio(ideally songs) from YouTube.
name: YouTube Music Downloader
title: YouTube Music Downloader

api_list.name: MP3
api_list.description: Downloads the audio of the URL provided in the 'url' parameter.

api_list.name: Ping
api_list.description:
Returns status code of the request and generally used to check if the server if up and running,
Also returns a x-response-time header to determine the latency.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-music-downloader.p.rapidapi.com/ping"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-music-downloader.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-music-downloader.p.rapidapi.com/ping"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-music-downloader.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
